intro: Oncostemum terniflorum, commonly known as the three-flowered oncostemum, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale pink in color. It produces small, oval-shaped fruits that contain a single seed. Oncostemum terniflorum is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests or along stream banks.
